header.title: Seasonal Highlights & Expert Tips
header.subtitle: Discover what's blooming now and get expert care advice for every season

plants.name: Japanese Maple
plants.description: Stunning fall foliage with vibrant red and orange colors. Perfect for adding dramatic autumn color to your landscape.

plants.name: Winter Jasmine
plants.description: Bright yellow flowers bloom in winter, providing cheerful color during the coldest months.

plants.name: Cherry Blossom
plants.description: Beautiful spring blooms create a stunning display. A classic choice for spring garden interest.

plants.name: Hydrangea
plants.description: Large, colorful flower clusters bloom throughout summer. Excellent for adding bold color to shaded areas.

tips.title: Deep Watering Technique
tips.description: Water plants deeply but less frequently to encourage strong root development. Aim for 1-2 inches per week.

tips.title: Spring Fertilizing Schedule
tips.description: Begin fertilizing in early spring when new growth appears. Use a balanced, slow-release fertilizer for best results.

tips.title: Winter Plant Protection
tips.description: Wrap tender plants in burlap and mulch around the base to protect from freezing temperatures.

tips.title: Summer Pruning Tips
tips.description: Prune spring-blooming shrubs right after blooming ends. This ensures next year's buds have time to develop.

tips.title: Natural Pest Control
tips.description: Encourage beneficial insects with native plants. Ladybugs, lacewings, and birds are natural pest controllers.

tips.title: Fall Garden Cleanup
tips.description: Remove diseased plant material and fallen leaves to prevent pest and disease issues next season.

newsletter.title: Stay in the Grow
newsletter.description: Get seasonal care tips, new arrival notifications, and exclusive offers delivered to your inbox
newsletter.disclaimer: No spam, just helpful gardening tips. Unsubscribe anytime.

company.description: Expert plant care and community service

story.title: Growing Excellence Since {foundedYear}
story.subtitle: What started as a family vision has grown into Southern New Jersey's premier wholesale nursery.
paragraphs: Founded by the Gianaris family in {foundedYear}, New Life Nursery Inc. began with a simple mission: to grow top quality material for buyers who are interested in the best. Today, after more than four decades, we continue as a family-owned and operated business, maintaining the traditional values and horticultural expertise that built our reputation.

With over 70 acres in production in Bridgeton, New Jersey, we specialize in growing beautiful, healthy, and consistent plant material at competitive prices. Our wholesale operation serves landscape professionals and businesses throughout the region with sizes ranging from 3-gallon shrubs to 25-gallon specimen trees.

items.title: Quality First
items.description: We source only the healthiest plants and provide expert care guidance to ensure your success.

items.title: Local Expertise
items.description: 40+ years of experience with Southern New Jersey growing conditions and climate-appropriate plant selection.

items.title: Family Heritage
items.description: Family-owned and operated by the Gianaris family, maintaining traditional values and expertise.

items.title: Sustainability
items.description: Committed to environmentally responsible practices and promoting native plant species.

mission.title: Our Mission
